casebody.data:
No. 138,

Misc.

Arnold et al. v. North Carolina. Fred W. Harrison and J. Harvey Turner for petitioners. T. W. Bruton, Attorney General of North Carolina, and Ralph Moody, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of North Carolina granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
